body:
Hello All,


I have been using trad with my undergraduate students for a number of years.
Last used with the KNOPPIX_V5.1.1CD-2007-01-04-EN.iso (debian) and built
with the makeall script. Worked fine no issues.


Would be sad not to see it in there as it is very valuable in weening the
fancy gui/mouse generation into serious software.


Regards 


Terry Mc Minn
Faculty of Built Environment, Art and Design
Curtin University of Technology
GPO Box U 1987 Perth 6845
Western Australia
Email: T.Mcminn at curtin.edu.au
CRICOS Provider Code: 00301J
